rawContent:
Until now, males were not allowed in women's bathrooms, thus rapists (or pedophiles) were not given easy and uninhibited access to women who are removing their clothing in a secluded area.

With these new "trans" laws - all a violent offender needs to do is state they identify as female.  Rape and molestation victims (which far, far outnumber the gender confused) are hypersensitive to men being around while they are in vulnerable areas.

Rape victims now must walk into a bathroom where they will remove clothing and have the possibility of males looking through the stall cracks, filming them with iPhones, or outright attacking them if they are left alone in a bathroom.

Men and women who have not been victims may not realize the extreme panic that this scenario holds, but the scenario is very real and frightening to someone who has already been victimized.

Our society is trading safety and security of a large number of the population for a very small percentage of sick individuals.

I am furious at the deterioration of our culture.
